text: taking of private property compensation and use assent of the legislature amend the introductory paragraph of rsa i to read as follows whenever a state of emergency is declared or invoked and the taking of real or personal property is required the governor with the advice and consent of the executive council and with the assent of of the senate and of the house of representatives may by warrant specifying the particular real property and the personal property by specification of the types quantities and general location together with the names of the owners when known authorize the commissioner of safety by his or her agents to
